text: Tathagata Satpathy, Biju Janata Dal MP from Odisha, staging a dharna at theNew Delhi airport late on Friday night, after a Bhubaneswar-Delhi Air India flight was delayed by nearly eight hours. He alleged that some VIPs tried to move the crew of the Bhubaneswar flight to another plane causing the delay.— PHOTO: Special Arrangement
title: Ground rules
